metadata.title: CVE-2024-47677 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:exfat: resolve memory leak from exfat_create_upcase_table()If exfat_load_upcase_table reaches end and returns -EINVAL,allocated memory doesn't get freed and whileexfat_load_default_upcase_table allocates more memory, leading to amemory leak.Here's link to syzkaller crash report illustrating this issue:https://syzkaller.appspot.com/text?tag=CrashReport&x=1406c201980000
